title: Ep 25: The Judgies Get Divorced
description:
Today's Proceedings: A girlfriend attempts to use snot as lube during an intimate moment, a coworker gets teased for being a vegan, and a hairdresser receives a $1 tip.  We also dive into some Life Pro Tips about saving time, being safe in a traffic jam, and more!  

Rate and Review our podcast and share it with your friends!  

Follow us on Twitter: 

https://twitter.com/judgiespod 

Follow us on Instagram: 

https://instagram.com/judgiespod 

Music by: Iván 

https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg 

Logo/Designs by: 

https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121 


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
